uuid.description: The unique identifier of the series.

slug.description: The machine-name "slug" of the series to use in its canonical URL.

itemType.description: The type of object.  In this case, a series.

revision.description: The revision number of the object.  This is used for version management.

shortDescription.description: The short description of the series.

mediumDescription.description: The medium description of the series.

longDescription.description: The long desciption of the series.

showColor.description: This field is needed for Android. It will have a hex value as "#000000".

media.description: A list of media objects associated to the series (can be images or videos).

categories.description: A list of Categories taxonomyTerm UUIDs that is associated with this series.

tags.description: A list of the Tags taxonomyTerm UUIDs that is associated with this series.

published.description: A boolean field that identifies whether the series has been published.

links.description: A List of objects containing URL and text title of link associated to the series.

genre.description: A list of genre that is associated with this series.

contentRating.description: The content rating of this series.

unscripted.description: A boolean field that identifies whether the series is unscripted.

syndicated.description: A boolean field that identifies whether the series is syndicated.

seriesType.description: This identifies whether the series is a web-series or a TV series.

relatedSeries.description: A list UUIDs of other series related to this series.

seriesEpisodeLength.description: The standard series episode length in minutes.

daypart.description: This identifies the programming timeframe of the series.  It can be Daytime, Primetime, or Late night.

programStatus.description: This identifies the status of the series.  It can be Upcoming, In-seasons, Off-Season, Archived, Current, or Classic.

currentSeason.description: The Unique identifier of the most current season.

collection.description: The Unique identifier of series collection.

sortTitle.description: The SORT-friendly title of the series.
